spec.expr:
_stream:{log.syslog.appname=panos,panos.device_name in(${firewall:doublequote}),panos.virtual_system in(${virtual_system:doublequote}),panos.type=${type:doublequote},panos.threat/content_type in(${subtype:doublequote}),network.direction=${direction:doublequote}}
AND panos.action:($action) AND $Logsql
| stats by (panos.source_country) count() results 
| sort by (results) desc 
| limit 10

_stream:{log.syslog.appname=panos,panos.device_name in(${firewall:doublequote}),panos.virtual_system in(${virtual_system:doublequote}),panos.type=${type:doublequote},panos.threat/content_type in(${subtype:doublequote}),network.direction=${direction:doublequote}}
AND panos.action:($action) AND $Logsql
| stats by (panos.destination_country) count() results 
| sort by (results) desc 
| limit 10

_stream:{log.syslog.appname=panos,panos.device_name in(${firewall:doublequote}),panos.virtual_system in(${virtual_system:doublequote}),panos.type=${type:doublequote},panos.threat/content_type in(${subtype:doublequote}),network.direction=${direction:doublequote}}
AND panos.action:($action) AND $Logsql
| stats by (network.transport_port,panos.action) count() results 
| sort by (results) desc 
| limit 10

_stream:{log.syslog.appname=panos,panos.device_name in(${firewall:doublequote}),panos.virtual_system in(${virtual_system:doublequote}),panos.type=${type:doublequote},panos.threat/content_type in(${subtype:doublequote}),network.direction=${direction:doublequote}}
AND panos.action:($action) AND $Logsql
| stats by (network.application,panos.action) count() results 
| sort by (results) desc 
| limit 10

_stream:{log.syslog.appname=panos,panos.device_name in(${firewall:doublequote}),panos.virtual_system in(${virtual_system:doublequote}),panos.type=${type:doublequote},panos.threat/content_type in(${subtype:doublequote}),network.direction=${direction:doublequote}}
AND panos.action:($action) AND $Logsql
AND panos.application_container:* 
| stats by (panos.application_container,panos.action) count() results 
| sort by (results) desc 
| limit 10

_stream:{log.syslog.appname=panos,panos.device_name in(${firewall:doublequote}),panos.virtual_system in(${virtual_system:doublequote}),panos.type=${type:doublequote},panos.threat/content_type in(${subtype:doublequote}),network.direction=${direction:doublequote}}
AND panos.action:($action) AND $Logsql
| stats by (panos.application_category,panos.action) count() results 
| sort by (results) desc 
| limit 10

_stream:{log.syslog.appname=panos,panos.device_name in(${firewall:doublequote}),panos.virtual_system in(${virtual_system:doublequote}),panos.type=${type:doublequote},panos.threat/content_type in(${subtype:doublequote}),network.direction=${direction:doublequote}}
AND panos.action:($action) AND $Logsql
| stats by (panos.application_subcategory,panos.action) count() results 
| sort by (results) desc 
| limit 10

options.content:
- **Start—session** started
- **End—session** ended
- **Drop—session** dropped before the application is identified and there is no rule that allows the session.
- **Deny—session** dropped after the application is identified and there is a rule to block or no rule that allows the session.

spec.description:
Custom LogsQL filter attached to every query.
Set to "*" to not filter.
See https://docs.victoriametrics.com/victorialogs/logsql/
spec.name: Logsql
